def fix_spaces(text):

    fix_spaces("Example 1") == "Example_1"

    fix_spaces(" Example   3") == "_Example-3"
    """
    # String that contains spaces 
    whitespace = re.compile(r'(\s+)(\s+)')
    # String that contains only one space 
    single_space = re.compile(r'(\s+)(\s+)')
    
    # String that contains multiple spaces 
    multiple_space = re.compile(r'(\s+)(\s+)(\s+)')
    
    # Replace all spaces with underscores
    text = whitespace.sub('_', text)
    
    # Replace all consecutive spaces with -
    text = single_space.sub('-', text)
    
    # String has more than 2 consecutive spaces
    if len(text) > 2:
        text = multiple_space.sub('-', text)
    
    # String has no more than 2 consecutive spaces
    if len(text) == 2:
        text = ''.join(['', '-', '']) + '-' + text
    
    return text
